data.author: Barry Xu
data.message:
Merge develop branch to main (#1)

* Add load_balancing_policy

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Add MessageForwardManager class

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Add ServiceClientProxyManager and ServiceServerProxy

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Add common.cpp to CMakeLists.txt

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Update load_balancing_process

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Add implementation of LoadBalancingProcess

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Not use service name in response receive queue

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Implement MessageForwardManager and main

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Update code in LoadBalancingProcess

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Fix segment fault while existing

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Update logger code

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Enable discovery thread to find service servers

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Fix a bug and add debug log

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Change WRITER GUID output log

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Fix some bugs

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Add debug for LoadBalancingProcess class

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Update debug

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Remve unused code

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Use send index instead of shared_future as key

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Fix a bug on using less response time strategy

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Not use ros2 parameter to handle input parameter

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

* Update README

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>

---------

Signed-off-by: Barry Xu <barry.xu@sony.com>
